title: Teacher leaks questions before exam, if I study them for test, would it be cheating? assim al hakeem
transcript: in science class our midterm is approaching and our science teacher gives us the exact questions from the test paper and I think this is cheating uh so if I use these questions to study I I INF for you have one of two options either you don't study them and fail or you study them and pass you choose if the system of the school is corrupt and the manager knows about this and they leak the questions either change your school or go with the flow most likely the teacher gives you 100 questions 10 of which will come in the exam and this is not cheating and this is permissible
